trends: There have been no other sightings in Conyngham
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving north on north main street in plains, pa at 6:15 pm on feb. 20. i noticed a bright white light hovering over some houses in the distance, maybe about 1\4 mile away. it was dark and i had no depth perception. it could have been very close or very far away; i couldnt tell. at first, i thought it was an approaching aircraft, because to the north about 10 miles lies the wilkes-barre\scranton airport. the light disappeared and then quickly reappeared to the east. it stayed bright for a second, disappeared and then reappeared near its original spot. it stayed bright again for a second, disappeared and then reappeared to the west, all in quick succession. it then disappeared completely from sight. this all lasted about six seconds. i have never seen anything like this before. the light seemed to bounce back and forth across the sky and then just disappeared.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Saw white light or lights alternately appear and disappear quickly for a few seconds
